subject: order never confirmed
description_text:
hey just reaching out in regards to a order i was charged for on jan 7
around 12pm that i never received any kind of confirmation of my order
being received by you guys. My name is Kobe stadel and the order should be
going to manhattan ks.

conversations.body_text: Hi Kobe Stadel,     Since you did not provide an email address, you did not receive the order confirmation and shipping notification. Below is your logistics tracking link.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047231332868,SF6047231332877

Didn’t realize I hadn’t put an email on there, I appreciate it!!

On Wed, Jan 14, 2026 at 1:27 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Kobe Stadel,     Thank you for your purchase. You're welcome.
